instruction: Find material with URI 'oci://quay.io/rhoai-konflux/alpine' and commit '149feff81b1fc443edb5eb8351753344abb5aba4a04a5ade4a760fb9efe48c2e'
output_code:
package attestation_check

import rego.v1

material_found if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some material in att.statement.predicate.materials
    material.uri == "oci://quay.io/rhoai-konflux/alpine"
    material.digest.sha1 == "149feff81b1fc443edb5eb8351753344abb5aba4a04a5ade4a760fb9efe48c2e"
}

package attestation_check

import rego.v1

task_status_check if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "push-dockerfile"
    task.status == "Succeeded"
}

package attestation_check

import rego.v1

bundle_ref := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "clone-repository"
    ref := task.ref.bundle
} else := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "clone-repository"
    some param in task.ref.params
    param.name == "bundle"
    ref := param.value
}

package attestation_check

import rego.v1

task_results := [result |
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "push-dockerfile"
    some result in task.results
]

task_results := [result |

    task.name == "rpms-signature-scan"

bundle_ref := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "prefetch-dependencies"
    ref := task.ref.bundle
} else := ref if {
    some att in input.attestations
    some task in att.statement.predicate.buildConfig.tasks
    task.name == "prefetch-dependencies"
    some param in task.ref.params
    param.name == "bundle"
    ref := param.value
}
